title.default: Centralize and Automate Your Orders <highlight>from Every Channel</highlight>

hero.subtitle: Headless OMS for companies selling on Tiendanube and Mercado Libre. Centralize, manage, and automate your orders in one place, connected to your ERP and logistics.
hero.waitlistSubtitle: Join and be among the first to try the multichannel OMS for e-commerce.

feature1.title: Orders from all your channels
feature1.description: Receive and manage orders from Tiendanube and Mercado Libre in a single dashboard

feature2.title: Automate your operation
feature2.description: Status updates, history, and automatic notifications to your internal systems

feature3.title: Multi-tenant and roles
feature3.description: Secure access for your team, with permissions and company separation

feature4.title: API & Webhooks
feature4.description: Easily integrate with your ERP, WMS, or logistics via configurable API and webhooks

signin.title: Login to your account
signin.description: Enter your email below to login to your account

signup.title: Create an account
signup.description: Enter your email below to create an account
signup.name: Name

invitations.title: You're Invited!
invitations.subtitle: Join an organization on LLMonitor
invitations.invalidLinkDescription: This invitation link is invalid or has been corrupted. Please check the link and try again.
invitations.notFoundDescription: This invitation could not be found. It may have been canceled or expired.
invitations.expiredDescription: This invitation has expired. Please contact the organization admin for a new invitation.
invitations.authRequired: You need to login or create an account to accept this invitation.
invitations.wrongAccountDescription: You are logged in with a different email than the one invited.
invitations.readyToJoinDescription: Everything looks good. You can now accept or reject this invitation.

landing.subtitle: Comprehensive tools to understand, optimize, and troubleshoot your LLM interactions
landing.ecosystem: Integrated across the AI ecosystem: OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Mistral, open-source models & more

features.title: Full-spectrum visibility into your AI operations
features.subtitle: Comprehensive tools to understand, optimize, and troubleshoot your LLM interactions

analytics.title: Advanced Prompt Analytics
analytics.description: Capture the full context of every LLM request with detailed metrics on inputs, outputs, latency, status codes, and token consumption.

multiModel.title: Universal Provider Support
multiModel.description: Seamlessly monitor OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Mistral, Grok, Llama, and custom deployed models—all with the same powerful tooling.

cost.title: Cost & Performance Intelligence
cost.description: Identify costly inefficiencies, performance bottlenecks, and silent failures before they impact your users or your bottom line.

drift.title: Behavioral Drift Detection
drift.description: Automatically detect subtle changes in model outputs over time or across different providers to maintain consistent user experiences.

testing.title: Production A/B Testing Engine
testing.description: Test competing prompt strategies, model configurations, and provider options with real users to optimize for both quality and cost.

alerts.title: Intelligent Alert System
alerts.description: Receive targeted notifications via Slack or webhooks when crucial thresholds are breached for performance, cost, or reliability.

developers.title: Effortless integration, comprehensive insights
developers.frameworks: Native support for LangChain, LlamaIndex, and direct APIs
developers.subtitle: Built by developers, for developers — minimal integration effort, maximum insight
developers.integrationDesc: Just one line of code to start getting insights
developers.apiDesc: Designed with developer experience in mind
developers.noLockInDesc: Freedom to switch models and providers anytime
developers.frameworksDesc: Seamless integration with your existing stack

audience.title: For everyone navigating the AI complexity curve
audience.teamsDesc: Gain comprehensive visibility into model performance, cost structures, and user interactions to build superior AI products.
audience.startupsDesc: Optimize your AI infrastructure early with detailed insights into usage patterns, cost drivers, and performance bottlenecks.
audience.buildersDesc: Fine-tune your AI-powered tools with precision debugging and behavior monitoring across complex interaction chains.
audience.anyoneDesc: Replace blind debugging with comprehensive visibility into your entire LLM operation stack from prompts to completions.

dashboard.title: Centralized AI Monitoring Dashboard
dashboard.description: Our intuitive dashboard provides real-time metrics on prompts, completions, token usage, costs, latency, and more — enabling data-driven optimization of your AI investments.

waitlist.title: Join the Waitlist
waitlist.subtitle: Sign up to get early access and updates

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Manage your API keys for accessing LLMonitor services

modal.title: API Key created
modal.description: Copy and save this key now. For security, you won't be able to see it again after closing this message.

error.enterName: Please enter a name for the API key

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Manage your projects and organize your AI monitoring
projects.noProjectsDescription: Create your first project to start organizing your AI monitoring
projects.notFoundDescription: The project you're looking for doesn't exist or you don't have access to it.

organize.title: 🚀 Organize your monitoring
organize.description: Group API keys, logs, and analytics by project for better organization

collaboration.title: 👥 Team collaboration
collaboration.description: Invite team members and manage permissions per project

analytics.title: 📊 Project-specific analytics
analytics.description: Get insights and reports scoped to individual projects

configuration.title: ⚙️ Custom configurations
configuration.description: Set project-specific alerts, budgets, and monitoring rules

projects.inviteNewMembersDescription: Invite new members to join this organization
projects.sendInvitationsDescription: Send invitations to add new members to your organization

organization.name: Name
organization.delete_project_desc: This action will delete the project and everything associated. Are you sure?
organization.empty_description: Create your first project to get started.

costAnalysis.description: Deep dive into your LLM spending patterns

costByProvider.title: Cost by Provider
costByProvider.description: Spending breakdown across different LLM providers
